title: Analyzing the Impact of Forensic OPM in Online Higher Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational concepts in online education management
context.additional_context: Case analysis training for practicing professionals using mixed research methodologies.

learning_goals: Explain forensic characteristics (targeting, extraction, opacity, capture) in OPM (Online Program Manager) contract structures
Analyze the impact of OPMs on vulnerable student populations using mixed-methods research
Identify exploitative structures in public institutions' online program operations and propose alternatives

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
